patthana17.21:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
patthana17.21:1.1_1: And when it comes to pleasant feeling ...
patthana17.21:3.1_0: That is the cause you fourteen things. ...
patthana17.21:6.1_1: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana17.21:8.1_0: There is a cause of pleasant feeling ...
patthana17.21:9.1_0: Taking on the basis, one finds out in the present life.
patthana17.21:9.1_1: There is nothing more than twenty years old,
patthana17.21:9.1_2: (This should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
